00031 void
00032 ears::Model1::init()
00033 {
00034   LOG( logINFO ) << "Initializing Model 1";
00035   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "version 1.0 (last mod. 2009-12-04)";
00036   
00037   // smoothing 
00038   initSmoothing();
00039   
00040   init_ = true;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 
00046 void
00047 ears::Model1::setSmoothingAuto()
00048 {
00049   double sum_ne;
00050   int entityNum = 0;
00051   int progress = 0;
00052   int lastProgress = 0;
00053   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < entities_.entityNum(); entityID++ ) {    
00054     // indicate progress    
00055     progress = 100 * ( entityID + 1 ) / entities_.entityNum();
00056     if ( progress % 10 == 0 && progress > lastProgress ) {
00057       LOG( logDEBUG ) << progress << "% completed";
00058       lastProgress = progress;
00059     }
00060     // we ignore entities without any associated documents
00061     if ( entities_.entityDocNum( entityID ) > 0 ) {
00062       double ne = 0.0;
00063       const DISTR_T& pde = entities_.entityDocs( entityID );
00064       
00065       // n(e) = \sum_d (n(d) * p(d|e))
00066       for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator it=pde.begin(); it != pde.end(); it++ ) 
00067         ne += (double) index_.docLength( it->first ) * it->second;
00068       
00069       sum_ne += ne;
00070       entityNum++;
00071     }
00072   }
00073   
00074   // smoothingParam_ holds Dirichlet's beta, where \beta = (\sum_e n(e)) / |e|
00075   smoothingParam_ = (double) sum_ne / entityNum;  
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 
00081 ears::ASSOCRES_T
00082 ears::Model1::scoreAll()
00083 {
00084   ASSOCRES_T pqe_all;
00085   double lambda = smoothingParam_; // for J-M smoothing
00086   double beta = smoothingParam_; // for Dirichlet smoothing
00087   int entityNum = entities_.entityNum();
00088   int queryNum = queries_.queryNum();
00089   
00090   if ( !init_ ) {
00091     LOG( logERROR ) << "Model needs to be initialized first";
00092     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );                
00093   }
00094     
00095   LOG( logINFO ) << "Calculating topic-entity associations";
00096 
00097   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Constructing collection Language Model";
00098   lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* collCounter 
00099     = new lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter( index_ ); 
00100   lemur::langmod::UnigramLM *collModel 
00101     = new lemur::langmod::MLUnigramLM( *collCounter, index_.termLexiconID() );
00102   
00103   // caching
00104   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Caching collection probabilities"; 
00105 
00106   // store p(t) for all query terms in a map
00107   std::map< lemur::api::TERMID_T, double > pt_cache;
00108   for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00109     const DISTR_T& ptq = queries_.query( qID );
00110     for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = ptq.begin();
00111          term_it != ptq.end(); term_it++ ) {
00112       
00113       const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00114       pt_cache[termID] = collModel->prob( termID ); // p(t)
00115     }
00116   }
00117   
00118   // +++
00119   // calculate p(q|e) for all entities and queries
00120   // +++ 
00121   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < entityNum; entityID++ ) {
00122     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Entity #" << (entityID+1) << "/" << entityNum
00123       << " (" << entities_.entityID( entityID ) << ")";
00124     
00125     std::vector< double > pqe; // p(q|e) for entity e
00126     pqe.resize( queryNum, 0.0 );
00127     
00128     // build entity language model
00129     int entityDocNum = entities_.entityDocNum( entityID );
00130     
00131     if ( entityDocNum > 0 ) {
00132       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Creating model based on " 
00133         << entityDocNum << " associated documents";
00134       
00135       ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter* entityCounter 
00136         = this->entityCounter( entityID );
00137       double ne = (double) entityCounter->sum(); // n(e)
00138       
00139       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Scoring queries";
00140       for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00141         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "  Query #" << (qID+1) << "/" << queryNum
00142           << " ('" << queries_.queryID( qID ) << "')";
00143 
00144         double score = 0.0;
00145         const DISTR_T& q = queries_.query( qID ); // q
00146         
00147         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    log p(q|e) = ";
00148 
00149         for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00150              term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00151           
00152           const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00153           const double& ptq = term_it->second; // p(t|q)
00154           double& pt = pt_cache[termID]; // p(t)                    
00155           double nte = entityCounter->count( termID ); // n(t,e)
00156           double pte; // p(t|\theta_e)
00157           
00158           // Jelinek-Mercer smoothing
00159           // p(t|\theta_e) = (1-\lambda) * (n(t,e)/n(e)) + \lambda * p(t)
00160           if ( smoothingMethod_ == "jm" ) 
00161             pte = (double) (1.0 - lambda) * (nte / ne) + lambda * pt;           
00162           // Dirichlet smoothing
00163           // p(t|\theta_e) = (n(t,e) + \beta * p(t)) / (n(e) + \beta)
00164           if ( smoothingMethod_ == "dirichlet" ) 
00165             pte = ((double) nte + beta * pt) / ((double) ne + beta);
00166           
00167           // log p(q|e) += p(t|q) * log ( p(t|\theta_e) )
00168           score += ptq * log( pte );
00169           
00170           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      + p('" << index_.term( termID ) << "'|q) "
00171             << "[" << ptq << "] * log( p(t|e) [" << pte << "] )";
00172           
00173         } // query term t (termID)
00174         
00175         // record p(q|e)
00176         pqe[qID] = exp( score );
00177         
00178         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      = " << score;
00179         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    p(q|e) = " << pqe[qID];
00180         
00181       } // query q (qID)
00182 
00183       delete entityCounter;
00184     }
00185     // no associated documents -- entity scores 0 on all queries
00186     else {      
00187       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "No associated documents";
00188     }
00189     
00190     // record scores
00191     pqe_all.push_back( pqe );    
00192     
00193   } // entity e (entityID)
00194   
00195   delete collCounter;
00196   delete collModel;
00197   
00198   LOG( logINFO ) << "Model 1 completed";
00199 
00200   return pqe_all;
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00204 
00206 ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter* 
00207 ears::Model1::entityCounter( const ID_T& entityID )
00208 {
00209   lemur::api::IndexedRealVector irv;
00210   const DISTR_T& pde = entities_.entityDocs( entityID );
00211 
00212   // consider all documents associated with the entity
00213   for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator it=pde.begin(); it != pde.end(); it++ ) 
00214     irv.PushValue( it->first, it->second );
00215   
00216   lemur::api::PseudoFBDocs* entityDocs = 
00217     new lemur::api::PseudoFBDocs( irv, -1, false );
00218   
00219   ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter* counter
00220     = new ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter( *entityDocs, index_ );
00221   
00222   irv.clear();
00223   delete entityDocs;
00224   
00225   return counter;
00226 }
